title: Joker & The Dark Clowns: The New Symbols of Chaos and Protest (Chile, Hong Kong, Beirut)
description:
JOKER, the massively successful Todd Phillips film, is now a global game changer. This is a continuation of my look at how  the Joker became the King of the Dark Clowns. And NOW how clowns and especially Joaquin Phoenix's Joker have become symbols of protest and rebellion worldwide in less than a month. 

This is a continuation of my video JOKER: KING OF THE DARK CLOWNS ...  https://youtu.be/-4rvQWhVvbA

And it is a testament to the depth of Joker how much conversation it generates. I particularly appreciated Jonathan Pageau's take it. I have included links below to some of the best reviews I have run across so far. Joker essentially up ends the mainstream conversation of where we are and opens a door to a new cultural climate. Like Hitchcock's Psycho, which opened the door to a new darker cinema. And like Star Wars, which helped to create a new template for entertainment, the one Joker completely subverts. Joker is something that will have deep cultural resonances for years to come.

Some worthy reviews:
Jonathan Pageau: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H74BbcTs6xs
Tim Pool: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=51GhgLuFBUk
Impression Blend (Marianna Neal): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=plcgVcbHEuQ
Chris Stuckmann: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rnyuxpky1Cw
Jeremy Jahns: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PJORkfmnmdY
Akkad Daily (Carl Benjamin): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wS9tHYYJgEE
Masters of Movies: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-_fN3c66t74

SUBSCRIBE! SHARE! CONTRIBUTE!
Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me from financially crashing here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 7 hours worth of extra content immediately. 
Click this...  https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG

Watch this video for more about our extra content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. Swim against the stream my friends. 

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Byrne
#jokermovie #joker #jokerprotests #clowns #clownworld
